name: Tight Space (MevLyshkin, akaneiro)
description:
Welcome Friend!

You have a unique possibility to play TIGHT SPACE game! The game is about very Small Universe traversing through tight space of the multiverse. Be sure to use quick thinking and unmatched eye-hand coordination to help the Small Universe to AVOID DANGERS of the multiverse. There are a lot of them! You can also help the Small Universe to GATHER SMALL PLANETS to strengthen itself (they give POINTS!) What's more, contrary to popular belief the MULTIVERSE IS SHRINKING!

Be sure to gather as many points as possible before the inevitable!

You can also play using our backup server: https://leinnan.github.io/tsg_game

Credits:

- Piotr Siuszko- programming, playtesting

- Magdalena Pacewicz- Graphics, playtesting

- Jakub Misztal- UI, graphics, playtesting

- Roksana Burdzińska- sounds, playtesting

- Tomasz Przybyło- graphics, playtesting
